required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Labor Induction After Failed Induction With Dinoprostone.
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Cervical Ripening Balloon Versus 2nd Dinoprostone Insert for Labor Induction in Women With a Failed 1st Attempt of Induction With Dinoprostone.

brief_summary.textblock: Women after induction of labor with a dinoprostone insert will be evaluated after 24 hours from the beginning of labor induction. Women with a BISHOP score of less than 5 will be randomized to 1 of 2 groups. Induction with a cervical ripening balloon versus induction with a 2nd dinoprostone insert.

detailed_description.textblock: Nulliparous women with obstetric indications for induction of labor who were induced with a dinoprostone insert and failed to go into labor after 24 hours from the beginning of labor induction and a BISHOP score of less than 5 will receive a thorough explanation regarding the study and sign informed consent. The eligible women will be randomized to 1 of 2 groups. Induction with a cervical ripening balloon versus induction with a 2nd dinoprostone insert. Relevant demographic and medical information will be gathered from the patients' electronic files.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of induction up to 24 hours from induction.
From the time of induction up to 120 hours from induction.
primary_outcome.description: The number of hours it takes to deliver.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of induction up to 120 hours from induction.
From the time of induction up to 120 hours from induction.
secondary_outcome.description: The rate of uterine revision postpartum.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of induction up to 120 hours from induction.
From the time of induction up to 120 hours from induction.

clinical_study.condition: Induction of Labor Affected Fetus / Newborn

arm_group.description: Women induced with a second dinoprostone insert.
Women induced with a cervical ripening balloon.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women after induction of labor with Dinoprostone.
- BISHOP score of under 5 after 1st induction attempt.
- Nulliparous women.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women after induction of labor with a cervical ripening balloon.
- BISHOP score of over 5 after 1st induction attempt.
- Multiparous women.
